
## ``hc_defs``

Adding patterns to be used in highcharts series

#### Description 

Helper function to use the fill patter plugin 
http://www.highcharts.com/plugin-registry/single/9/Pattern-Fill.

#### Usage
<pre><code>
hc_defs(hc, ...)
</code></pre>

#### Arguments 

* ``hc ``: A highchart htmlwidget object.

* ``...``: Arguments defined in http://www.highcharts.com/plugin-registry/single/9/Pattern-Fill.
